original: Ekblom, Karin Rangel Margareta, fil. mag., rektor, Norrköping, f. 30/ 6/11 i Arvika av färghandl. Axel E. o. Ida Lundberg. — Fil. kand. 34, fil. mag. 35, provar v. Umeå h. a. 1. 46. Resesekr. f. kvinnl. avd. av Sv:es kristl. gymnasiströr. 36-37, timlär. v. Bromma komm. flicksk. 37-40, sekr. i Gbgs KFUK 40-41, ungdrsekr. i Karlstads stift 41-46, ord. ämneslär. o. rektor v. Norrköp. komm. flicksk. sed. 46.
translated: Ekblom, Karin Rangel Margareta, fil. mag., principal, Norrköping, b. June 30, 1911 in Arvika, daughter of the paint merchant Axel E. and Ida Lundberg. She obtained a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1934, a Master of Arts degree in 1935, and passed the teacher's exam at Umeå h. a. 1 in 1946. She served as travel secretary for the women's department of Sweden's Christian Gymnasium Association from 1936-1937, an hourly teacher at Bromma's municipal girls' school from 1937-1940, secretary of Gothenburg's YWCA from 1940-1941, youth secretary in Karlstad's diocese from 1941-1946, and as a regular subject teacher and principal at Norrköping's municipal girls' school since 1946. She married in the year 19xx, but the partner's name is not provided in this biography.
